user.title: Firewalla MSP Setup
user.description: Configure your Firewalla integration using MSP API credentials. You'll need a personal access token from your Firewalla MSP account.

data_description.msp_url: The URL of your Firewalla MSP API endpoint (usually https://firewalla.encipher.io)
data_description.access_token: Your personal access token from the Firewalla MSP account

device_selection.title: Select Firewalla Device
device_selection.description: Choose which Firewalla device to integrate with Home Assistant. You can create multiple integrations for different devices.

data_description.box_gid: Select the Firewalla device you want to integrate with Home Assistant
data_description.name: Choose a descriptive name for this integration instance

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Firewalla MSP API. Please check your MSP URL and ensure your network connection allows HTTPS access to the API endpoint.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid MSP API credentials. Please verify your personal access token is correct and has the necessary permissions to access your Firewalla devices.
error.no_devices: No Firewalla devices found in your MSP account. Please ensure your MSP account has access to at least one Firewalla device and that the device is online.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred while setting up the integration. Please check the Home Assistant logs for more details and try again.
error.name: Integration name cannot be empty. Please provide a descriptive name for this integration instance.
error.timeout: Connection to Firewalla MSP API timed out. Please check your network connection and try again.
error.rate_limit: Too many requests to the Firewalla MSP API. Please wait a moment and try again.
error.server_error: Firewalla MSP API server error. The service may be temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

abort.already_configured: This Firewalla device is already configured in Home Assistant. Each device can only be configured once per integration instance.
abort.invalid_host: The provided MSP API URL is not valid. Please check the URL format and try again.
abort.auth_failed: Authentication with the Firewalla MSP API failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
